channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 19:08 Air alert in Kharkiv region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🔴 19:08 Air alert in Kharkiv region. Follow further messages. #Kharkiv_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 18:27 Alarm lifted in Donetsk region. Follow further messages.

item.title: 🔴 18:17 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter!

Go to shelter! #city_of_Nikopol_and_the_Nikopol_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟠 14:00 FREE EVACUATIONWe ask you to urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24-hour FREE hotline for evacuation of civilians – 0800339291
item.description: 🟠 14:00 FREE EVACUATIONWe ask you to urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24-hour FREE hotline for evacuation of civilians – 0800339291#Kupyanskyi_rayon This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
